definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]

pinyin: shang1 han2 sha1 men2 shi4 jun1

sentences.english: A number of investigators have used the fluorescent-antibody (FA) technique for Salmonella detection.
sentences.chinese: 因此，沙門氏菌檢測的熒光抗體技術爲能被廣範應用。

sentences.english: "Salmonella doubles every 20 minutes under ideal conditions," Keener said.
sentences.chinese: 基納說，在理想環境下，沙門氏菌每20分鐘複製。

sentences.english: Salmonella is the most common bacterial form of food poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 沙門氏菌是一種最普遍的引起食物中毒的病菌。

sentences.english: Consequently, the FA procedure for Salmonella detection has not been in routine use.
sentences.chinese: 因此，沙門氏菌檢測的熒光抗體技術爲能被廣範應用。

sentences.english: But are wallets a more serious menace than salmonella-encrusted kitchen sinks?
sentences.chinese: 但是，錢夾比攜帶沙門氏菌的廚房洗碗池更具威脅嗎？

sentences.english: Isn't that like KFC advertising salmonella chicken?" --Jay Leno
sentences.chinese: 這難道不就是像肯德基做廣告說，要賣沙門氏菌雞嗎？

sentences.english: Salmonellae are more widespread than is commonly comprehended.
sentences.chinese: 沙門氏菌的散播比平常所瞭解的更爲廣泛。

sentences.english: Objective To study the factors of affecting the efficacy of Salmonella Typhimurium (ST) enteritis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討影響鼠傷寒沙門氏菌腸炎療效的因素。

sentences.english: Listeria monocytogenes and Salmonella than some of the common E. coli are more lethal.
sentences.chinese: 李斯特菌比常見的沙門氏菌和某些大腸桿菌更爲致命。

sentences.english: Salmonellosis is a major problem in most countries.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數國家沙門氏菌病是一個主要問題。

sentences.english: This strain specifically, Salmonella enteritidis, is found in chickens.
sentences.chinese: 腸炎沙門氏菌則主要在雞體內發現。

sentences.english: Last month's salmonella outbreak got over 1,500 people sick.
sentences.chinese: 上個月沙門氏菌大爆發撂倒了1500多人。

sentences.english: Results The poison was caused from Type B paratyphoid salmonella bacillus of the pig meat.
sentences.chinese: 結果豬頭肉中的乙型副傷寒沙門氏菌引起食物中毒。

sentences.english: This form of salmonella can be passed from chickens that appear healthy.
sentences.chinese: 這種沙門氏菌能夠通過看起來健康的雞傳染開來。

sentences.english: "Salmonella doubles every 20 minutes under ideal conditions, " Keener said. "When sitting there for an hour, two could become 32.
sentences.chinese: 基納說，在理想環境下，沙門氏菌每20分鐘複製。

sentences.english: You can't smell or see Salmonella in or on food.
sentences.chinese: 你能在食物中聞見或看見沙門氏菌。

pinyin: you1 men2 luo2 xuan2 gan3 jun1
